issue.title: [CF 1156] Show Dot strength icon
issue.body:
First of all,hi and thx for this addon.

I would like to request to add an icon/condition order in this addon that would show you the tick strength of a dot on your target,also with the funktion "show when dot dmg is > xxxx ". IÂ´m playing a fire mage among others and as a fire mage you have to use your combustion spell when your ignite dot is at highest or at least over a certain amount.
I think this would be a great improvement for this class and perhaps others too.

Is it possible to create and add an icon or condition like this?

Greetings

Mindfork


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1156 | Raw

comments.body:
Check this icon it does exactly what you need.

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^STarget ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SIgnite ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^N2^S[Stacks:VeryShort:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^S12654 ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFTOOLTIP ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S>= ^SUnit^Starget ^SLevel^N1000 ^SName^SIgnite ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SShowTTText^B ^t^N73501^S`| ^Sicon^^

I have it show the stacks of the current damage on your ignite in a very short display and in the condition I have it only shown at 1k damage


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura

Thank you very much it works perfectly,didnt know that you could do it like this.

My most profound thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork
